Welcome to The Aichemist Codex’s documentation!

Intelligent File Management and Knowledge Extraction System

The Aichemist Codex is an advanced file management and knowledge extraction system designed to transform how you interact with your files and documents. It leverages AI and machine learning to provide intelligent file organization, content analysis, and relationship mapping.
